snippet: The soldiers were found a day after their truck overturned while crossing a river, killing nine. Five bodies had already been found, and three people survived.

byline.original: By LIAM STACK and CHRISTINE HAUSER
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Liam Stack

lead_paragraph: The soldiers were found a day after their truck overturned while crossing a river, killing nine. Five bodies had already been found, and three people survived.

headline.main: Fort Hood Teams Recover Bodies of Last 4 Soldiers Missing in Floodwaters
